content: I like the idea of creating a wake-up routine that I enjoy, so I think I'll try to incorporate some stretching or meditation into my morning routine. I've also been thinking about getting a smart alarm, so maybe I'll look into that too. By the way, I've found that reading a book for at least 20 minutes before lights out has helped me relax and reduce my screen time, which has made it easier for me to fall asleep and wake up in the morning.
